roundIncomplete.title: Round incomplete
roundIncomplete.predictionMissing: Not all players have valid prediction.
roundIncomplete.actualMissing: Not all players have valid actual.

roundIncorrect.title: Round incorrect
roundIncorrect.tooManyPredictions: A player predicted more hits than available
roundIncorrect.noMatchingPrediction: The predictions match the actual cards. Rule: No matching prediction is active
roundIncorrect.actualMismatch: The actual hits do not align with the given number of cards

predictionMatches.title: Prediction count matches
predictionMatches.message: Your current prediction matches the number of cards this round. This isn't allowed since rule (No matching prediction) is active.

playerCount.title: Player Count
playerCount.message: The game is designed for 3-6 players but can be played with two players when special rules are used.

noMatchingPrediction.name: No matching prediction
noMatchingPrediction.description: Players are not allowed to set predictions equal to the number of hits per round.
